text: @DrOz I've hardly seen you since @Oprah. I couldn't put my finger on it, but felt something was off so didn't follow your career. I figured it out when you said kids are appetizing guinea pigs for Covid-19 societal experiments. Kids should be last in, not first. You're the confused one
